mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_PHONE, U.USER_ADDRESS, U.USER_AUTH, U.USER_STATUS, U.USER_BIRTH, S.STUDENT_REGIDATE, S.STUDENT_TERM, S.STUDENT_YEAR, S.STUDENT_TOTAL_CREDIT, S.STUDENT_TERM_GRADE, S.STUDENT_TOTAL_GRADE, S.STUDENT_MAJOR, S.STUDENT_FIRST_MAJOR FROM USERS U, STUDENT S WHERE U.USER_ID = S.STUDENT_ID AND U.USER_ID=#{user_id} AND U.USER_PW=#{user_pw}

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_PHONE, U.USER_ADDRESS, U.USER_AUTH, U.USER_STATUS, U.USER_BIRTH, P.prof_regidate, P.prof_position, P.prof_room, P.prof_degree, P.prof_major FROM USERS U, PROFESSOR P WHERE U.USER_ID = P.PROF_ID AND U.USER_ID=#{user_id} AND U.USER_PW=#{user_pw}

SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_EMAIL, U.USER_PHONE, U.USER_ADDRESS, U.USER_AUTH, U.USER_STATUS, U.USER_BIRTH, A.admin_regidate, A.admin_department, A.admin_position FROM USERS U, ADMIN A WHERE U.USER_ID = A.ADMIN_ID AND U.USER_ID=#{user_id} AND U.USER_PW=#{user_pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS(USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_AUTH, USER_STATUS, USER_BIRTH, USER_PHOTO) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address}, #{user_auth}, #{user_status}, #{user_birth}, #{user_photo})

INSERT INTO STUDENT(STUDENT_ID, STUDENT_NAME, STUDENT_REGIDATE, STUDENT_TERM, STUDENT_YEAR, STUDENT_TOTAL_CREDIT, STUDENT_TERM_GRADE, STUDENT_TOTAL_GRADE, STUDENT_MAJOR, STUDENT_FIRST_MAJOR) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{student_regidate}, 0,#{student_year},0,0,0, #{student_major} , #{student_first_major})

INSERT INTO PROFESSOR(PROF_ID, PROF_NAME, PROF_REGIDATE, PROF_POSITION, PROF_ROOM, PROF_DEGREE, PROF_MAJOR, PROF_FIRST_MAJOR ) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{prof_regidate}, #{prof_position}, #{prof_room}, #{prof_degree}, #{prof_major}, #{prof_first_major} )
INSERT INTO ADMIN(ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_REGIDATE, ADMIN_DEPARTMENT, ADMIN_POSITION) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{admin_regidate}, #{admin_department}, #{admin_position} )
